properties.name: Dommian Ocean
properties.backstory: The grandest of oceans,  a place of origins.  The Western Ocean.

properties.name: Dommian Ocean
properties.backstory: The grandest of oceans,  a place of origins.  The Eastern Ocean.

properties.name: Bay of Fate
properties.backstory: On a small isle in the middle of this bay the Orders of the Twins,  Reflection and Rage have convened to decide their fates in many historical events of the past.

properties.name: Northern Black Sea
properties.backstory: The large island belonging to the Order of Reflection north of the sea once held a gathering where they feigned a truce with the Order of Enlightenment,  which was broken only hours later when the fleet of Enlightenment was decimated.  The Black Betrayal happened on the water and the sea has kept the namesake.

properties.name: Southern Black Sea
properties.backstory: The large island belonging to the Order of Reflection north of the sea once held a gathering where they feigned a truce with the Order of Enlightenment,  which was broken only hours later when the fleet of Enlightenment was decimated.  The Black Betrayal happened on the water and the sea has kept the namesake.

properties.name: Admiral's Bay
properties.backstory: Mighty military harbors from the Orders of Anger,  Rage and Fury line this bay.

properties.name: Feltic Sea
properties.backstory: The busiest waterway in the world carrying much of the world's economic trade.

properties.name: Vibrian Waters
properties.backstory: Unique plantlife grows in these shallow waters.  Vaunted for their uses in many different alchemical concoctions.

properties.name: Pochton's Sea
properties.backstory: The great Admiral Pochton owned this section of water during his many campaigns as leader of the Order of Power's navy.

properties.name: Tides of Tears
properties.backstory: The Great Sheik Sheltim sailed to battle and won the war but lost his life.  He was so loved it is said the body of water was once fresh,  and only became salty when his subjects lined the banks and filled it with tears on his final journey home.

properties.name: Sea of Hermits
properties.backstory: This large body of water is vast and empty.  Many who are looking to escape something head out this way.

properties.name: Divine Sea
properties.backstory: This body of water is a beautiful navy blue piece of perfection.  Gorgeous coastlines.  Awe inspiring temples and architecture ring the water on every side.  When the orders were formed it is said they all found themselves on the shores of the Divine Sea

properties.name: The Divine Strait
properties.backstory: For anyone looking for absolution of sins it is said they only need pass through this strait 3 times while confessing their crimes.  If they are forgiven it is said they will see a swan within the next 24 hours.

properties.name: Elendemirâ€™s Song
properties.backstory: The White Mage Elendemir burned the forests all along the coast before a massive battle.  It is said that ever since at dawn you can see scenes from the battle in the sunlight reflecting on the water and hear the flames in the crashing waves.

properties.name: Sea of Sorrows
properties.backstory: The gravely injured travel this water body in search of bubbles rippling to the surface,  the water is said to have restorative properties for even the most heinous injuries.

properties.name: Serene Waters
properties.backstory: A beautiful blue northern body of water.  The winds traveling from north to south never come down very strong at this longitude.

properties.name: Great Northern Sea
properties.backstory: An enormous coldwater body that links many realms from different orders.  It is a common battleground during order wide conflicts.

properties.name: Needle's Pass
properties.backstory: A narrow pass that is a test of seaworthy men and vessels alike.

properties.name: Dread Sea
properties.backstory: Uneven sea floors,  extreme winds,  krakens and other beasts make this sea an unappealing option to any who can avoid it.

properties.name: Arctic Mirror
properties.backstory: Once every few years,  this sea freezes into glistering shards of ice,  reflecting back any ray that is cast upon them.

properties.name: Paragonian Channel
properties.backstory: This channel is littered with white rock formations which the superstitious say were busts of the gods at one time.

properties.name: Empyrean Estuary
properties.backstory: A coastal paradise.  It is said the gods landed on these shores when they appeared here from the ether.

properties.name: Woe Tides
properties.backstory: Some of the strongest winds in the world along with jagged coasts make even skilled seamen avoid these waters whenever possible.

properties.name: Gale Strait
properties.backstory: The unobstructed winds from the western Dommian Ocean whip through this strait.

properties.name: Dusk Sea
properties.backstory: It is said a calamitous battle of dragons happened above this body of water.  Night and day the water appears purple.

properties.name: Slugs' Bane
properties.backstory: A dead sea.  Surrounded by salt deposits this sea harbors no life.  It is a destination for many to float and seek healing.

properties.name: Tranquil  Tides
properties.backstory: A tropical paradise. The winds from the Dommian sea blow gently from the south west.

properties.name: Eagle Inlet
properties.backstory: Eagles soar above this waterway as commonly as flies over manure.

properties.name: Bloody Channel
properties.backstory: Battles from time immemorial between the orders attempting to overthrow the naval military stronghold of evil have filled this channel with blood many times.

properties.name: Gulf of the Phoenix
properties.backstory: This is the most abundant source of aquatic life in all the waters of the world.  For that reason it is also inhabitated by every species of bird you can imagine.

properties.name: Shimmering Coast
properties.backstory: Massive gold deposits on the coasts here have led to many shipwrecks littering the sea floor with gold coins. They shimmer through the perfectly clear tropical water when the sun hits the water just right.

properties.name: Serpent Coves
properties.backstory: Stories of giant sea snakes inhabiting these waters are not to be dismissed as legends or myths.  Shipwrecks on shore attest to that.

properties.name: Forgotten Coast
properties.backstory: In frigid eastern waters only the desperate find themselves on this coast.

properties.name: Dommian's Whisper
properties.backstory: The cold winds of the eastern Dommian Ocean blow through this narrow strait.  It is said those who listen closely enough to the whisper of the wind can tell when and where storms will hit the eastern coast.

properties.name: The Glistering Crests
properties.backstory: The waves here are so enormous that when they implode upon the sea bottom,  sand with a special type of quartz is catapulted into the air.

properties.name: Unister Bay
properties.backstory: Crystalline compounds float on the surface of this bay,  the light reflected off of them is known to blind sailors and throw them off course.

properties.name: Ir's Seat
properties.backstory: These many smaller bays are the perfect locations for harbors.  It is also where the Order of Power can test their battleships without too much notice.

properties.name: Dragon's Bay
properties.backstory: Dragon wings are pasted against the clear blue skies more often than not above this bay.

properties.name: Crystal Coves
properties.backstory: These coves are often contested due to their natural resources and strategic positions.

properties.name: Mering's Bay
properties.backstory: A bay extending deep into Titan territory.

properties.name: Boiling Bay
properties.backstory: Acidic gas from deep within the planet's crust react with the salty water and can locally increase temperatures.

properties.name: Vibrian Shards
properties.backstory: A coast known for its sharp rocky formations.

properties.name: Arath's Strait
properties.backstory: The southern wind here is so strong that only the best ships and captains can navigate against it.

properties.name: Joint East Harbor Zone
properties.backstory: The largest economic ports of the Western hemisphere lie within the bays and coasts of the Order of Rage and the Order of Fury.

properties.name: First Arm of Vasmir
properties.backstory: The first arm of the Vasmir economic zone.  Known for its fishing harbors.

properties.name: Second Arm of Vasmir
properties.backstory: The second arm of the Vasmic economic zone.  Known for its trade across the Sea of Sorrows.

properties.name: Third Arm of Vasmir
properties.backstory: The third arm of the Vasmic economic zone.  Known for its export of fine goods.

properties.name: Tracean Coast
properties.backstory: A coast known for its exotic Tracer fish.

properties.name: White Sea
properties.backstory: A sea with shallow waters and pure-white sand.

properties.name: Mason Coast
properties.backstory: The harbors on this coast need to be reinforced due to massive waves.  Many dikes have been built as well to prevent flooding inland.

properties.name: Demon's Claw
properties.backstory: Making the turn can be tricky due to the unpredictable winds,  yet the sea is the only way to access a hidden realm.

properties.name: Eye of the Kraken
properties.backstory: Legends say that mysterious creatures lurk in the deep, but these days Sailors often avoid this area due to the unpredictable weather.

properties.name: Eye of the Kraken
properties.backstory: Legends say that mysterious creatures lurk in the deep, but these days Sailors often avoid this area due to the unpredictable weather.

properties.name: Chimeric Bay
properties.backstory: Legends say hermits on opposite sides of the bay prayed to their gods,  one Vitriol the other Titans,  infusing their power into each side of the bay.  One side of the bay glows bright in myriad colours and wondrous marine animals while the other is drab and full of alien life.
